entities.name: dobby
entities.description: Dobby is a house-elf who is part of the House-Elf Liberation Front. He is described as being small and having 'small shoulders'. Dobby is also shown to be very emotional and expressive, often squealing or crying when he is upset.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is a wizard who is friends with Dobby. He is described as being able to calm down Dobby after he gets upset.

entities.name: winky
entities.description: Winky is another house-elf who is part of the House-Elf Liberation Front. She is shown to be very loyal and protective of her masters, particularly Mr. Crouch.

entities.name: mr crouch
entities.description: Mr. Crouch is a wizard who has been Winky's master in the past. He is mentioned as being in need of Winky's help.

relationships.description: Dobby and Harry Potter are friends, as shown by the fact that Harry is able to calm down Dobby after he gets upset.
Winky is very loyal and protective of Mr. Crouch, her former master.
Dobby is part of the House-Elf Liberation Front.
